subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn completed a sweep of World Cup races at Lake Louise, Alberta, for a second straight year, winning the super-G in 1 minute 22.82 seconds.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn completed a sweep of World Cup races at Lake Louise, Alberta, for a second straight year, winning the super-G in 1 minute 22.82 seconds.
